multiplechoiceresponse.p:
Examine the following statement:
If pepper is a spice and butter is a fat, then either this dish is too spicy or it needs more butter and then it will be perfect.
multiplechoiceresponse.label: How many simple statements are in the compound statement above?

div.p:
The simple statements are:
pepper is a spice
butter is a fat
this dish is too spicy
it needs more butter
it will be perfect
